data.title: Creators of Innovative Mobility
data.meta_site_name: Tribus Group - Creators of Innovative Mobility -
data.text:
Tribus develops electrical midibus Movitas

The electric Movitas midibus: From drawing to working prototype within 2 years. This innovation power was crowned by a place in the top 3 of the prestigious Dutch Automotive Innovation Award with jury chairman Jan-Peter Balkenende. Tribus launched the first driving prototype at Busworld 2019. Designed as an e-bus, the Movitas is energy efficient and modular in various sizes from 8.20 - 9.70 meters. The many sustainable technologies, great maneuverability, excellent isolation and the unique design offer the traveler, public transport company and municipality a new choice when it comes to passenger transport in urban areas.

Tribus launches electric wheelchair minibus 2019 is the year that Tribus launches several big developments. Tribus joins the international network of Volkswagen Nutzfahrzeuge as a Premium Partner. Together they develop the first fully electric Volkswagen Crafter wheelchair bus. This lightweight vehicle is the first electric minibus for M1 passenger transport that can be driven with a driving license B. With a practical range of 150 km, 8 seats and up to 2 wheelchair places, the vehicle is widely applicable for taxi companies. Thi [...]

Tribus celebrates 20th anniversary

Tribus celebrated its 20-year anniversary at the Taxi Expo in Houten. The booth was festively decorated and the back wall was covered with the historical timeline of Tribus, a bird's-eye view through 20 years. We also showed a collection of old innovations from Tribus and products from the old days.

Tribus signs government agreement for zero emissie passenger transport!

Tribus endorses the government agreement for fully zero-emission passenger transport by 2025. 32 municipalities and the Ministry of Infrastructure and Water Management signed the agreement in which they agree that all passenger transport will be completely zero-emission from 2025. In addition to the agreement, a covenant was signed by a large number of supplier market parties. The purpose of the agreement and covenant is that all parties will work together to realize the zero-emission vehicles. Tribus also showed its commitment and signed the covenant.

New design TriflexAIR Seat

We created a new design for the TriflexAIR seat. The seat has become lighter, stronger and ergonomic. A top quality design for intensive use.

Safety check control

This electronic secure system takes not only care of a secure check of the wheelchair restraints, but also of the seat belts. This electronic secure system warns the driver in case of incorrect use.
